data.title: The Guardian
data.meta_description: Kirby Dick is a two-time Emmy Award-winning and two-time Academy Award-nominated documentary film director. His films include the highly acclaimed The Hunting Ground, about sexual assault on college campuses, and The Invisible War and Twist of Faith, both nominated for an Academy Award.
data.text:
Those who deny that campus sexual assault is dire must misread the numbers

Kirby Dick and Amy Ziering

Studies over several decades have confirmed there are extremely high rates of sexual assault at US universities, writes the duo behind The Hunting Ground
